MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Boreland. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.35am to repair damaged overhead equipment, due to third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.06pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
